title: Narziss is worth a look!
content:
You have to look at this!

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/narziss/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804044107/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/narziss/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/narziss/")

Mr Jocham has done a type worthy of mention.

ChrisL
author: dezcom

comments.content: It's fabulous! I’ve been thinking hard about something I could use it for.
Wow... super-luxurious, especially on the swirls.
